direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods perform validation but with an additional field name parameter in the external method.
The validate method depends on the processing done by the process method to set up validation rules.
Both methods involve resetting or clearing state, though for different purposes (validation vs. reinitialization).
The validate method sets parameters that are used during validation, similar to how setParameter configures validation parameters.
The validate method retrieves parameter values that are set by getParameterValue, indicating a dependency on parameter management.
The validate method retrieves the form to be validated, which is a key part of the validation process.
The validate method uses validator actions retrieved by this method to perform validation.
